resources.string: You won\'t be able to use this program without granting permissions!
"This app won't work without granting permissions. Please request permission grant again."
What you will be using while delaying messages?
Here will be some ABOUT (or INFO) text

In order to use this application you need to grant two types of permissions. One is to read contacts and the other one is to send SMS to your contacts. Without granting these this application won\'t be able to properly! Please go back to settings and request permissions again!
Your history is empty, after you will send some messages, here you will see history!
